title: Oscars 2017 Red Carpet: The Moonlight Cast in Calvin Klein Suits - Vogue
text: The Men of Moonlight Have a Major Moment at the Oscars in Calvin Klein by Raf Simons February 27, 2017 1:47 AM by Steff Yotka Photo: Getty Images Raf Simons has been a menswear god for 20 years, but no one has ever worn menswear of his design to the Academy Awards—until now. At the 2017 Oscars today, Moonlight stars Trevante Rhodes, Ashton Sanders, and Alex R. Hibbert, who play the main character of Best Picture contender Moonlight at different stages of his life, all wore Calvin Klein by Raf Simons menswear. And they have the coolest Instagram to prove it. Loading View on Instagram The trio of actors wore dark wool tuxedos by the brand—eagle-eyed fashion fans will note that Rhodes’s tux is navy, while the other two are black—and posed on the red carpet together. The film’s relationship with Simons goes back to his New York Fashion Week debut for Calvin Klein, which was attended by Sanders and actress Naomie Harris, who also wore Calvin Klein tonight. In the sea of elaborate, baroque-edging menswear tonight, the Moonlight guys’ clean, elegant tuxes were a breath of fashion fresh air. But what else would you expect from the menswear legend and these stylish film stars? In This Story: Oscars
